**Hello!**  I'm Michael Krikor Gureghian, a senior studying **Statistics & Data Science** at UCLA. I'm passionate about finding connections in data to establish understanding and insight when it isn't innately there. 

I have extensive experience working with **medical research** and **biostatistics**, but also have practiced some **financial analytics** and **data engineering**. This experience has informed a lot of my analytical skillset, and I'm excited to see what future projects will help me learn and grow even more!
